name: Linux Mint Debian Edition (LMDE) 6
install_guide_markdown: LMDE is Linux Mint without Ubuntu. Based directly on Debian, offering long-term stability with Mint's polished interface. Download ISO, verify checksum, create bootable USB, boot, and install.

install_steps.title: Download LMDE ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Get the ISO from Linux Mint mirrors.

install_steps.title: Verify Checksum
install_steps.detail_md: Use sha256sum to verify ISO integrity.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable USB
install_steps.detail_md: Use Balena Etcher or Rufus to create bootable media.

install_steps.title: Install LMDE
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB and follow the graphical installer.
